pt.runtime

Class GuiThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.runtime.GuiThread

  • public class GuiThread
extends java.lang.Object
    This class instantiates an instance of a GUI thread proxy, based on the underlying virtual machine. It is through this class that ParaTask framework retrieves information about the current GUI thread.
    Since:
    18/8/2015
    Author:
    Mostafa Mehrabi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GuiThread() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean currentThreadIsEventDispatchThread()
      This method indicates if the current thread is the EventDispatchThread, and therefore it is the GUI thread.
      static java.lang.Thread getEventDispatchThread()
      Returns the current GUI (i.e., EventDispatch) thread of the system.
      static void init() 
      static void invokeLater(java.lang.Runnable r)
      Enqueues a handler method/task to be executed by the EventDispatchThread, and allows the enqueueing thread to carry on doing other jobs.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()

      • getEventDispatchThread

        public static java.lang.Thread getEventDispatchThread()
        Returns the current GUI (i.e., EventDispatch) thread of the system.
        Since:
        18/8/2015

      • currentThreadIsEventDispatchThread

        public static boolean currentThreadIsEventDispatchThread()
        This method indicates if the current thread is the EventDispatchThread, and therefore it is the GUI thread.
        Returns:
        true if the current thread is the EventDispatchThread , otherwise it returns false.
        Since:
        18/8/2015

      • invokeLater

        public static void invokeLater(java.lang.Runnable r)
        Enqueues a handler method/task to be executed by the EventDispatchThread, and allows the enqueueing thread to carry on doing other jobs.
        Parameters:
        r - Runnable object that represents the method/task.
        Since:
        19/8/2015
